name: Signal Simulator
description: Game inspired by SETI. Take the role of a scientist to find an extraterrestrial signal .Control massive Radio Antennas by using interactive control in your Observatory. Detect , download and decode unknown or story telling signals. Manage and Maintain an electrical system to improve your systems and make it more efficient.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7/Win 8/Win 10 x64 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Additional Notes: Future releases may require more hard drive space.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7/Win 8/Win 10 x64 Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Additional Notes: Future releases may require more hard drive space.
